00032 #ifndef __LWIP_API_H__
00033 #define __LWIP_API_H__
00034 
00035 #include "lwip/opt.h"
00036 #include "lwip/pbuf.h"
00037 #include "lwip/sys.h"
00038 
00039 #include "lwip/ip.h"
00040 
00041 #include "lwip/udp.h"
00042 #include "lwip/tcp.h"
00043 
00044 #include "lwip/err.h"
00045 
00046 #define NETCONN_NOCOPY 0x00
00047 #define NETCONN_COPY   0x01
00048 
00049 enum netconn_type {
00050   NETCONN_TCP,
00051   NETCONN_UDP,
00052   NETCONN_UDPLITE,
00053   NETCONN_UDPNOCHKSUM
00054 };
00055 
00056 enum netconn_state {
00057   NETCONN_NONE,
00058   NETCONN_WRITE,
00059   NETCONN_ACCEPT,
00060   NETCONN_RECV,
00061   NETCONN_CONNECT,
00062   NETCONN_CLOSE
00063 };
00064 
00065 enum netconn_evt {
00066   NETCONN_EVT_RCVPLUS,
00067   NETCONN_EVT_RCVMINUS,
00068   NETCONN_EVT_SENDPLUS,
00069   NETCONN_EVT_SENDMINUS
00070 };
00071 
00072 struct netbuf {
00073   struct pbuf *p, *ptr;
00074   struct ip_addr *fromaddr;
00075   u16_t fromport;
00076   err_t err;
00077 };
00078 
00079 struct netconn {
00080   enum netconn_type type;
00081   enum netconn_state state;
00082   union {
00083     struct tcp_pcb *tcp;
00084     struct udp_pcb *udp;
00085   } pcb;
00086   err_t err;
00087   sys_mbox_t mbox;
00088   sys_mbox_t recvmbox;
00089   sys_mbox_t acceptmbox;
00090   sys_sem_t sem;
00091   int socket;
00092   u16_t recv_avail;
00093   void (* callback)(struct netconn *, enum netconn_evt, u16_t len);
00094 };
00095 
00096 /* Network buffer functions: */
00097 struct netbuf *   netbuf_new      (void);
00098 void              netbuf_delete   (struct netbuf *buf);
00099 void *            netbuf_alloc    (struct netbuf *buf, u16_t size);
00100 void              netbuf_free     (struct netbuf *buf);
00101 void              netbuf_ref      (struct netbuf *buf,
00102            void *dataptr, u16_t size);
00103 void              netbuf_chain    (struct netbuf *head,
00104            struct netbuf *tail);
00105 
00106 u16_t             netbuf_len      (struct netbuf *buf);
00107 err_t             netbuf_data     (struct netbuf *buf,
00108            void **dataptr, u16_t *len);
00109 s8_t              netbuf_next     (struct netbuf *buf);
00110 void              netbuf_first    (struct netbuf *buf);
00111 
00112 void              netbuf_copy     (struct netbuf *buf,
00113            void *dataptr, u16_t len);
00114 void              netbuf_copy_partial(struct netbuf *buf, void *dataptr, 
00115               u16_t len, u16_t offset);
00116 struct ip_addr *  netbuf_fromaddr (struct netbuf *buf);
00117 u16_t             netbuf_fromport (struct netbuf *buf);
00118 
00119 /* Network connection functions: */
00120 struct netconn *  netconn_new     (enum netconn_type type);
00121 struct
00122 netconn *netconn_new_with_callback(enum netconn_type t,
00123                                    void (*callback)(struct netconn *, enum netconn_evt, u16_t len));
00124 err_t             netconn_delete  (struct netconn *conn);
00125 enum netconn_type netconn_type    (struct netconn *conn);
00126 err_t             netconn_peer    (struct netconn *conn,
00127            struct ip_addr *addr,
00128            u16_t *port);
00129 err_t             netconn_addr    (struct netconn *conn,
00130            struct ip_addr **addr,
00131            u16_t *port);
00132 err_t             netconn_bind    (struct netconn *conn,
00133            struct ip_addr *addr,
00134            u16_t port);
00135 err_t             netconn_connect (struct netconn *conn,
00136            struct ip_addr *addr,
00137            u16_t port);
00138 err_t             netconn_disconnect (struct netconn *conn);
00139 err_t             netconn_listen  (struct netconn *conn);
00140 struct netconn *  netconn_accept  (struct netconn *conn);
00141 struct netbuf *   netconn_recv    (struct netconn *conn);
00142 err_t             netconn_send    (struct netconn *conn,
00143            struct netbuf *buf);
00144 err_t             netconn_write   (struct netconn *conn,
00145            void *dataptr, u16_t size,
00146            u8_t copy);
00147 err_t             netconn_close   (struct netconn *conn);
00148 
00149 err_t             netconn_err     (struct netconn *conn);
